toursPage.title: Tripgrip – excursions in Dubai

toursPage.safe_payment: Secure payment via Visa, MasterCard and Apple Pay
toursPage.official_partners: On the UAE market since 2024. Official partners

description.title: Best Tours in Dubai and the UAE
description.intro1: Travel and tourism are all about new experiences, impressions, and emotions. They are different sides of discovery. It’s the human desire for the unknown that drives us.
description.intro2: The UAE fully understands the importance of tourism and does everything to develop it. Dubai is the flagship of tourism in the Middle East.
description.dubai_text1: Dubai amazes travelers with marvels created in just two decades.
description.dubai_text2: It’s hard to choose where to start exploring. So where to go and what to see?
description.subtitle: Dubai Tours 2025
description.overview: Start with a city tour in Russian: Burj Khalifa, fountains, Dubai Mall, Palm Jumeirah, Atlantis hotel, Burj Al Arab, museum, and gold market.
description.cruise: Continue with a cruise on a traditional 'Dhow' boat: dinner, entertainment, and views of Dubai Marina skyscrapers.
description.safari: Experience a desert safari with dunes, camels, bedouins, and a dinner show.
description.kids_parks: For kids: Legoland, waterpark, or Kidzania – a city of professions. Book cheaper on our website.
description.waterparks: Many waterparks await: Aquaventure, Laguna, Wild Wadi, and more.
description.activities: More: tours to the northern emirates, Indian Ocean, hot air balloons, dune buggies, cruises, ziplines, and more.
description.custom_tour: You can book a personal tour or a full entertainment program tailored to your needs.
description.ending: Dubai offers endless ways to relax – it’s all up to your imagination!
